sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - அறியப்படு, சூதுபேசு, ஒப்புக்கொடு, பார், அறி, அந்நியமாக்கு, கவனி, தெரி. மதி, விசாரி, முகதாட்சிணியம், காண், பார்த்தறி, அங்கிகரி, விளங்கு, காண்பி
1) to recognize, to acknowledge, to know, to respect, to discern, to regard
1) to regard, to observe, to pay attention to, to pay regard to, to notice
2) to recognize (as formerly known), to perceive
3) to be willing to recognize or acknowledge, to acknowledge with honor
2) to act or treat as foreign or strange, to disguise, to misconstrue

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to scrutinize, that is, look intently at; hence (with recognition implied), to acknowledge, be acquainted with, care for, respect, revere, or (with suspicion implied), to disregard, ignore, be strange toward, reject, resign, dissimulate (as if ignorant or disowning): - acknowledge, X could, deliver, discern, dissemble, estrange, feign self to be another, know, take knowledge (notice), perceive, regard, (have) respect, behave (make) self strange (-ly).
Cognate: H1971, H4378, H5234, H5235, H5236, H5237, H5238
